mapper.insert: insert into Product (seller_id, category_name, product_name, product_price, year_purchase, product_desc, product_img1, trade_method, pay_method, trade_area) values (#{seller_id}, #{category_name}, #{product_name}, #{product_price}, #{year_purchase}, #{product_desc}, #{product_img1}, #{trade_method}, #{pay_method}, #{trade_area})
mapper.select: select product_id, category_name, seller_id, product_name, product_price, year_purchase, product_desc, product_img1, product_img2, product_img3, product_img4, product_img5, created_datetime, view_count, like_count, trade_method, pay_method, trade_area from Product where product_id = #{product_id}
